text: Today, it seems like I can move around with some flexibility.
If there's anywhere you'd like to stop by or──

Ah,
I'll be waiting around here.

Yes──
Oh, it's been a while! Yes, I'm fine, thank you────
(Alright, I need to get back to Sakuya.)

That live performance the other day……
It was truly amazing……!

I felt like I made eye contact with Sakuya-sama on stage──
Well, that's just what I want to believe!

It's a shame.
If only we could have had this conversation before the live──

If I had been able to say, 'I've found you,'
… I'm sure I could say it now.

Can you forgive the me from that
day who didn't know you…?

(Even if it's just for a moment, being able to talk right away──
And Sakuya responding so kindly)

Actually, I still want to enjoy more time with you,
but──

Oh! You have plans, right?
Sorry for taking up so much time!

I'm so happy to have been able to talk to you!
It'll be a memory for a lifetime…!

So I'll keep working hard to create more memories
with you in the future.

…!! Thank you so much…!
Well then, um, I'll take my leave…!
No, I'm the one who should apologize.
I'm glad we could have a fun conversation.

Anytime──
I always get energy from all the fans.
